caption.p: A-B: Effect of T. bellirica fruit extracts and ellagic acid on the liver tissue antioxidant enzymes (A) Catalase (CAT), (B) Superoxide dismutase (SOD) in diclofenac treated rats for 21 days. Group-I: control rats; Group-II: DCF treated rats; Group-III: DCF + SLM treated rats; Group-IV: DCF + EA treated rats; Group-V: DCF + AQ treated rats; Group-VI: DCF + Eth treated rats. Values represent mean ± SD (n = 5). Abbreviations: DCF- diclofenac, SLM- silymarin, EA- ellagic acid, AQ- aqueous extract, Eth- ethyl acetate extract. (*) represents a significant difference from control (p < 0.0001). (#) represents significant difference from group II (a- p < 0.0005, b- p < 0.005).
